Identity.Name: Alaestos, The Celintran Bow
Identity.Basic_Description: Archer in robes clad in blue with golden 'aura' bow and other blue and gold auras along skin

Abilities.Name: Lob
Abilities.Ability: When calculating line of site, Archers of Celintra can pivot their straight line one time vertically.

Abilities.Name: Phase
Abilities.Ability: When sprinting, Archers of Celintra can move through solid objects if their sprint would end on a valid location.

Abilities.Name: Phased Arrow
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, Alaestos's next attack can target units without line of site.
